sub_title: I will teach you the language and culture of Pushkin and Tolstoy! Professional lessons live and online for all levels.
summary: My name is Aida German, but all my students call me Ida.  I am a professional teacher for Russion language. My mother tongue is Russian. I have experience with a wide range of students such as: university graduates, diplomats, ESA (European Space angency) employees, culture lovers. I am offering Russian lessons for individuals or small groups. The lessons can be given in English and/or Dutch. If learning Russian is your dream, please contact me for availability on lessons.

projects.title: Teaching Russian to Andre Kuipers Dutch ESA-astronaut
projects.description:
I have been following the Russian courses for some time now and they suite me just fine. This way II can maintain my Russian and expand it as well. The lessons proveed in a good atmosphere and vary between listening, reading, pronounciation and grammar. I will be sure to continue taking lessons with Aida.

Andre Kuipers Dutch ESA-astronaut

contributors.headline: I will teach you the language and culture of Pushkin and Tolstoy! Professional lessons live and online for all levels.

projects.title: Teaching Russian to George Janssen Portfolio Officer Europe and Central Asia, FMO
projects.description:
I started taking lessons from Mrs. German 1,5 years ago. The purpose was to be able to make some basic conversations in Russia. Now, 3 courses further, we read quite complicated texts and my conversation skills are much further than just basic. Mrs. German is a very demanding teacher, but the result is strong progress. Besides learning Russian, Mrs. German can tell you everything about  Russian culture and the Russian way of life. Last but not least, her lessons are very funny indeed. I can definitely recommend her.

George Janssen
Portfolio Officer Europe and Central Asia, FMO

contributors.headline: I will teach you the language and culture of Pushkin and Tolstoy! Professional lessons live and online for all levels.

projects.title: Teaching Russian to Joël Marti ESA International
projects.description: Ida German has been our Russian teacher for several years. I heard from a collegue that she was good in teaching and I can confirm that she is. Ida is capable of handling a group and taking care of each person. It is motivating to see that she likes teaching and that she highly appreciates efforts and progress. Therefore I warmly recommend Ida for learning a foreign language. learning another language is not something easy. Put all changes on your side and learn Russian from Ida!

contributors.headline: I will teach you the language and culture of Pushkin and Tolstoy! Professional lessons live and online for all levels.

projects.title: Theo Ruijter - General Manager Rotterdamse Volksuniversiteit
projects.description:
Mrs. Ida German-Shekter is a compentent and effective Russian teacher. Though a native Russian speaker she has a thorough command of the Dutch language.
For a season (24 lessons) Mrs. German was my teacher. It was a pleasant experience. She combines her professional skills and knowledge to effectiveness while maintianing a joyful atmosphere in class. If I had failed in doing my homework she always found a smooth way for me to join the group and pick up with the lesson. As general manager of the Rotterdam Volksuniversiteit I state that Mrs. German-Shekter for almost 25 years and is a well respected teacher. She always gets good evaluations from her students.
